name: azdo-extension-team-randomizer
description: Random Team Member Selector for Daily Standups
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.build:prod: npm run compile:prod && tfx extension create --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/*.json --overrides-file azure-devops-extension.prod.json --rev-version --output-path out
scripts.build:dev: dotenv -e .env -- npm run compile:dev && tfx extension create --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/*.json --overrides-file azure-devops-extension.dev.json --override {"publisher":"${AZDO_PUBLISHER}"} --rev-version --output-path out
scripts.publish:prod: npm run compile:prod && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/*.json --overrides-file azure-devops-extension.prod.json --rev-version --output-path out --token ${AZURE_DEVOPS_TOKEN}
scripts.publish:dev: dotenv -e .env -- npm run compile:dev && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs azure-devops-extension.json src/**/*.json --overrides-file azure-devops-extension.dev.json --override {"publisher":"${AZDO_PUBLISHER}"} --rev-version --output-path out --token ${AZURE_DEVOPS_TOKEN}
